title: Group portrait of Monarchs baseball team, including bat boy Gregory Benton in front; kneeling from left: Alvin Muldrow, Larry Bryant, Ronald Jackson, Kenneth Spencer, John Williams, Tyrone Scott, Lewis Johnson; standing: Coach Al Jackson, Robert Perry, Thomas Bold, DeCanie Benson, David Jones, John Jackson, John Gobble, James Colvin, and manager Alberta Broaden, posed on playing field
medium: black and white: Kodak Safety Film
provenance_text: The Estate of Charles H. Harris, Pittsburgh
